monday: I give you a knife from under the hills, and a stick that I stuck through a dead man's eye
tuesday: I give you a claw I ripped from a rat
wednesday: I give you a name, and the name is Lost
thursday: I give you blood from out of my vein, and a feather I pulled from an angel's wing
friday: I call you with names, of my lord, of my lord
saturday: I give you coin I made from a stone
sunday: I give you a song I stole from the dirt
